answers.answer: I am not a physician, but a volunteer that is the mom of a type 1 diabetic.  I would also talk to his endocrinologist suggest that you have your dad get a second opinion.  I would and see what he recommends, as surgery can cause stress to the body and make blood sugars harder to control.I would also suggest than your dad see a nutrionist.  This is a person that is trained to help tailor a menu to your dad's needs and likes.  We have seen one for our daughter diabetes and it has helped to keep her blood sugars in line.
